sentence: The  war  was  triggered  by  an  unprecedented  cross-border  attack  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  at  least  1,200  people  were  killed  -  most  of  them  civilians  -  and  about  240  others  taken  hostage.

sentence: Palestinian  media  cited  local  officials  and  witnesses  as  saying  dozens  of  civilians  were  killed  as  Israel  kept  up  its  strikes  across  Gaza  overnight.
